text: Gurbanguly Mälikgulyýewiç Berdimuhamedow (born 29 June 1957) is a Turkmen politician. He was the 2nd President of Turkmenistan from 2007 until 2022. Berdimuhamedow, a dentist, worked in the government under President Saparmurat Niyazov as Minister of Health. He is the first dentist in the world to head a state or a government. In February 2022, Berdimuhamedow announced his plans not to run for re-election in 2022. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Turkmenistan Category:Former dictators
title: Gurbanguly Berdimuhamedow
